description:
We are seeking a dedicated and organized Administrative Assistant to join our team. In this role, you will provide essential administrative and office support under the direct supervision of the Managing Partner.

Essential Functions

Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

Responsibilities

Provide general administrative and office support.

Maintain agendas, calendar meetings, and follow up on pending items as needed.

Take thorough and clear meeting minutes.

Assist in preparing client reports.

Coordinate travel arrangements.

Communicate with clients via writing, telephone, and virtual platforms.

Perform clerical duties as needed.

Qualifications

Strong interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills. Clear and concise communication is essential.

Self-starter with the ability to work independently and within a team environment.

Capable of working in a fast-paced environment with strong attention to detail.

Requirements

Excellent time management skills.

Highly organized with strong attention to detail.

Proficient in Microsoft Office and general computer literacy.

Personal effectiveness and credibility.

Proactive and resourceful problem-solving skills.

Supervisory Responsibility

This position does not have supervisory responsibilities.

Work Environment

This job operates in a professional office environment and routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers, filing cabinets, and fax machines.

Physical Demands

The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear. The employee frequently is required to stand, walk, use hands and fingers to handle or feel, and reach with hands and arms.

Position Type/Expected Hours of Work

Some flexibility in hours is allowed, but the employee must be available during the core work hours of 7:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

Preferred Education And Experience

College degree.

One to two years of administrative experience.

Training or experience in computer applications.

Other Duties

Please note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties, or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Duties, responsibilities, and activities may change at any time with or without notice.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $20.00 per hour

Benefits

401(k)

Dental insurance

Health insurance

Paid time off

Vision insurance

Schedule

8-hour shift

Monday to Friday

Location:

California (Required)

Work Location: Remote

Join us and be part of a dynamic team that values dedication, professionalism, and continuous improvement. If you are detail-oriented, proactive, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we encourage you to apply!

Employment Type: Full-Time
